iiv.filter

Interface FilterSampling

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CNUStdImgFile, DisplayBox, DisplayColorMap, DisplayColorMapQuilt, DisplayComponent, DisplayDraw, DisplayLine, DisplayOval, DisplayShape, DisplayText, IntensityProjectionImage, LinearImageFilter, ScriptableDisplayComponent, ShowPointDisplayLine, SingleImg

    public interface FilterSampling
    FilterSampling defines routines to allow handling filter sample types for a component.
    Since:
    iiV1.132
    See Also:
    DisplayComponent
